duties_responsibilities.duty: Assisting in creating visually compelling designs for a variety of marketing collateral.
Collaborating on various design projects that span digital and print mediums.
Supporting the creation of engaging digital content, including social media visuals, GIFs, and short videos.
Contributing to the design of printed materials such as brochures, flyers, posters, and promotional items.
Assisting in image retouching, resizing, and optimization for various digital platforms.
Staying updated on design trends, industry best practices, and emerging technologies.

education_certification.credential: Pursuing a degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field.
